strings.AFX_IDS_HELPMODEMESSAGE: Select an object on which to get Help
strings.ID_HELP_USING: Display instructions about how to use help
strings.PTR_APP_INSTANCE_RUNNING: IMatch Pack & Go has detected that an instance of IMatch is running.\r\nPack & Go cannot backup all files while IMatch is open. Please close IMatch before continuing.
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_COMPRESSION: Error while compressing or de-compressing data.
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_CREATEFILE: Error creating a file. Make sure you have write access to the media and folder.
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_FILEFORMAT: Unknown package format or package damaged.
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_FRM_CREATEFOLDERFAILED: Failed to create the folder '{0}'. Please check that the folder can be created on the media and that you have sufficient privileges to create folders and files.
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_FRM_DBCOMACT_FAILED: Failed to compact the database. See the application log file for more info.
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_FRM_DBDIAG_FAILED: Database diagnosis failed. See diagnosis log file for more info.
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_FRM_DBOPEN: Failed to open the database '{0}'. See the application log file for more info.
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_FRM_DBPHYSDAMAGE: Failed to open the database '{0}'. The database is PHYSICALLY damaged and has to be replaced from a working backup. See the application log file for more info.
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_FRM_RESTOREFILE: Restore of packet for file {0} failed.
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_FRM_RESTOREFILE_OPEN: Restore failed. Cannot open package file.
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_FRM_SHARINGVIOLATION: The file is already open in another application.
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_FRM_TARGETFOLDERACCESSFAILED: Cannot create or access the target folder {0}
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_FRM_VERIFYFILE: Verification of packet for file {0} failed.
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_FRM_VERIFYFILE_OPEN: Verification failed. Cannot open package file.
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_OPENFILE: Error opening a file. Make sure you have read access to the media and folder.
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_PAKETFORMAT: Unknown packet format, package file is corrupted.
strings.PTR_ERRMSG_SHARINGVIOLATION: The file is already open and locked by another application.
strings.PTR_PACK_CACHE_INFO: Including cache files can create very large package files.
strings.PTR_PACK_NO_DB: You are not including a database in your package!\r\n\r\nIf you have forgotten to add a database, click 'Cancel' and add a database. Else click on OK.
strings.PTR_STEP_COMPLETED_PACK: <Bold>Successfully completed in {0}.</Bold><LineBreak/>Package file size: {1}. Compression ratio: {2}%.<LineBreak/><Hyperlink Foreground='{fg}' Tag='pagfile'>Show package file in Windows Explorer.</Hyperlink>
strings.PTR_STEP_COMPLETED_PACK_WARNINGS: <Bold>Completed with {wno} warnings in {0}.</Bold><LineBreak/>Package file size: {1}. Compression ratio: {2}%.<LineBreak/><Hyperlink Foreground='{fg}' Tag='pagfile'>Show package file in Windows Explorer.</Hyperlink><LineBreak/><Bold>Warnings:</Bold><LineBreak/>{w}
strings.PTR_STEP_COMPLETED_RES: <Bold>Successfully completed in {0}.</Bold><LineBreak/>Package file contains {1} packets. {2} packet(s) skipped. {3} restored.
strings.PTR_STEP_COMPLETED_RES_WARNINGS: <Bold>Completed with {wno} warning(s) in {0}.</Bold><LineBreak/>Package file contains {1} packet(s). {2} packet(s) skipped. {3} restored.<LineBreak/><Bold>Warnings:</Bold><LineBreak/>{w}
strings.PTR_STEP_COMPLETED_VER: <Bold>Successfully completed in {0}.</Bold><LineBreak/>Package file contains {1} packets. {2} verified.
strings.PTR_STEP_COMPLETED_VER_WARNINGS: <Bold>Completed with {wno} warnings in {0}.</Bold><LineBreak/>Package file contains {1} packets. {2} verified.<LineBreak/><Bold>Warnings:</Bold><LineBreak/>{w}
strings.PTR_STEP_FAILED_PACK: <Bold>Failed after {0}.</Bold><LineBreak/>{err}<LineBreak/>See the <Hyperlink Foreground='{fg}' Tag='protfile'>protocol file</Hyperlink> for more information.
strings.PTR_STEP_FAILED_RESTORE: <Bold>Failed after {0}.</Bold><LineBreak/>{err}<LineBreak/>See the <Hyperlink Foreground='{fg}' Tag='protfile'>protocol file</Hyperlink> for more information.
strings.PTR_STEP_FAILED_VER: <Bold>Failed after {0}.</Bold><LineBreak/>{err}<LineBreak/>See the <Hyperlink Foreground='{fg}' Tag='protfile'>protocol file</Hyperlink> for more information.<LineBreak/><LineBreak/><Bold>The package file is damaged and must be replaced from a backup.</Bold>
strings.PTR_STEP_FAILED_VER_FILENOTFOUND: <Bold>Failed after {0}.</Bold><LineBreak/>Package file not found or accessible<LineBreak/>See the <Hyperlink Foreground='{fg}' Tag='protfile'>protocol file</Hyperlink> for more information.
strings.PTR_STEP_PROTFILE: Protocol file written to <Hyperlink Foreground='{fg}' Tag='protfile'>{0}</Hyperlink>.
strings.PTR_STEP_RESTOREPACKAGE_ORG: <Bold>Restoring Package file to original folders</Bold>.<LineBreak/>{0} with {1} packets.
strings.PTR_STEP_RESTOREPACKAGE_TO: <Bold>Restoring Package file to a different target folder</Bold>.<LineBreak/>{0} with {1} packets.<LineBreak/><Bold>Target folder</Bold>: <Hyperlink Foreground='{fg}' Tag='targetfolder'>{2}</Hyperlink>
strings.PTR_STEP_SCANFOLDERS: <Bold>These objects will be included in the package:</Bold><LineBreak/><Bold>  Folders:</Bold><LineBreak/>{0}
strings.PTR_STEP_SCANFOLDERS_COMPLETE: <Bold>{0}</Bold> files in <Bold>{1}</Bold> folders to process.<LineBreak/>Total data volume: <Bold>{2}</Bold>

dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_ABOUT.caption: About IMatch Pack & Go
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_BASE.caption: Base
Select the folder you want to restore the package to:
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_BASE.td.dlg.selfile.caption: Package Files
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_BASE.td.dlg.targetfolder.pro: Select the folder you want to store the package to:
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_MAIN.caption: IMatch Pack & Go
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_MUTEX.#l_msg:
<Border Background='#ffffff' Padding='10,10,10,10'>
					<StackPanel Orientation='Vertical'>
						<TextBlock TextWrapping='Wrap' FontSize='{fs12}' FontWeight='Bold' Padding='0,0,0,10'>IMatch is running and needs to be closed.</TextBlock>
						<TextBlock TextWrapping='Wrap' ><Bold>Pack & Go</Bold> cannot backup settings and other important files while IMatch is still running.<LineBreak/><LineBreak/>Please close IMatch now.<LineBreak/>This dialog <Bold>closes automatically</Bold> when IMatch has been closed and Pack & Go will continue.</TextBlock>
					</StackPanel>
					</Border>
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_MUTEX.caption: IMatch Pack & Go
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_PACK.#l_check_cache:H: \r\nIf you enable this option, the cache files for all included databases will also be included.\r\nThis can generate very large package files!
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_PACK.#l_check_compact:H: Compact and optimize databases before packing them.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_PACK.#l_check_diagnosis:H: \r\nEnable this option to run a diagnosis on all packed databases.\r\nThis is highly recommended.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_PACK.#l_check_run:H: \r\nThis option allows you to run the command specified below when the pack process is complete.\r\nUse it to run a batch command or script, shut down your PC etc.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_PACK.#l_del_old:H: Use this option if you want to delete older packages automatically when new packages are created.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_PACK.#l_target_folder: S&ave the package file to this folder:
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_PACK.caption: Pack
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_PACK.td.header.text: This operation combines all IMatch settings, presets, templates, scripts and other data into one <Bold>compressed package file</Bold>. You can optionally include one or more databases as well.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_PROTOCOL.caption: Protocol
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_RES.#l_check_uselast:H: Enable this to automatically use the last created package.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_RES.#l_dont_replace:H: Enable this option to keep existing files with the same or a later modifed date as the file in the package.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_RES.caption: Restore
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_RES.td.header.text: This operation restores the contents of a package back to the original folders or to a to different folder. Pack & Go automatically validates packets and restored files via check-sums.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_VERIFY.#l_check_uselast:H: Enable this to automatically use the last created package.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_VERIFY.caption: Verify
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APP_VERIFY.td.header.text: This operation tests the integrity of each element in the selected package to ensure that the entire package is valid and usable.
